languages.text: "Это остовы кораблей. Судя по маркировке, они принадлежали к флоту Лорд-инквизитора и, смею предположить, несли здесь боевое охранение. Характер разрушений указывает, что корабли были уничтожены неизвестным оружием, а рассеяние осколков указывает на скоротечность битвы. Кто-то налетел и уничтожил их всех в мгновение ока. Кто-то, с кем нам еще не доводилось сталкиваться".

"Those are ship carcasses. Judging by their markings, they were part of the Lord Inquisitor's fleet and likely acted as a patrol force. The damage doesn't look like it came from any weapon we know, and the way the debris are scattered suggests that the battle was short. Someone attacked and destroyed every one of them in the blink of an eye. Someone we have never encountered before."
languages.original_text: "Это остовы кораблей. Судя по маркировке, они принадлежали к флоту Лорд-инквизитора и, смею предположить, несли здесь боевое охранение. Характер разрушений указывает, что корабли были уничтожены неизвестным оружием, а рассеяние осколков указывает на скоротечность битвы. Кто-то налетел и уничтожил их всех в мгновение ока. Кто-то, с кем нам еще не доводилось сталкиваться".

traits.locale_text: "These are the ship carcasses. Judging by their markings, they belonged to Lord Inquisitor's fleet, and, I dare to assume, patrolled this place. The type of damage hints that ships were destroyed by an unknown weapon, and scattering of their shards presumes briefness of the battle. Someone raided them and destroyed every single one in a blink of an eye. Someone we have never encountered before."

The type of damage hints that ships were destroyed by an unknown weapon, and scattering of their shards presumes briefness of the battle. Someone raided them and destroyed every single one in a blink of an eye. Someone we have never encountered before."

The damage doesn't look like it came from any weapon we know, and the way the debris are scattered suggests that the battle was short. Someone attacked and destroyed every one of them in the blink of an eye. Someone we have never encountered before."

languages.text: “都是被摧毁的舰船，从舰船的徽记来看，应该是大审判官的舰队。我认为那些舰船应该是这片区域的巡逻舰队。这些船应该是被某种我们没见过的武器摧毁的，而且根据到处乱飞的碎片判断，那场战斗并没有持续多久。不知是什么人袭击了他们，一眨眼的功夫就把所有的舰船都消灭了。我们以前从来没遇到过这样的敌人。”
languages.original_text: "Those are ship carcasses. Judging by their markings, they were part of the Lord Inquisitor's fleet and likely acted as a patrol force. The damage doesn't look like it came from any weapon we know, and the way the debris are scattered suggests that the battle was short. Someone attacked and destroyed every one of them in the blink of an eye. Someone we have never encountered before."

traits.locale_text: “都是被摧毁的舰船，从舰船的徽记来看，应该是大审判官的舰队。我认为那些舰船应该是这片区域的巡逻舰队。这些船应该是被某种我们没见过的武器摧毁的，而且根据到处乱飞的碎片判断，那场战斗并没有持续多久。不知是什么人袭击了他们，一眨眼的功夫就把所有的舰船都消灭了。我们以前从来没遇到过这样的敌人。”

languages.text: « Ce sont des carcasses de vaisseaux. À en juger par leurs insignes, ils appartenaient à la flotte du seigneur inquisiteur et, j'imagine, patrouillaient dans ce secteur. Les dégâts subis indiquent qu'ils ont été détruits par une arme inconnue, et la dispersion des débris laisse penser que la bataille fut brève. Quelqu'un les a attaqués et tous détruits en un clin d'œil. Un adversaire que nous n'avons encore jamais rencontré. »
languages.original_text: "These are the ship carcasses. Judging by their insignia, they belonged to Lord Inquisitor's fleet and, I dare to assume, patrolled this place. The damage sustained indicates that ships were destroyed by an unknown weapon, and the scattering of their shards presumes a brief battle. Someone raided them and destroyed every single one of them in the blink of an eye. Someone we have never encountered before."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont des carcasses de vaisseaux. À en juger par leurs insignes, ils appartenaient à la flotte du seigneur inquisiteur et, j'imagine, patrouillaient dans ce secteur. Les dégâts subis indiquent qu'ils ont été détruits par une arme inconnue, et la dispersion des débris laisse penser que la bataille fut brève. Quelqu'un les a attaqués et tous détruits en un clin d'œil. Un adversaire que nous n'avons encore jamais rencontré. »

languages.text: "Es handelt sich um Schiffskadaver. Ihren Insignien nach zu urteilen gehörten sie zur Flotte des Großinquisitors und waren hier auf Patrouille, wie ich annehme. Die Schäden lassen darauf schließen, dass die Schiffe durch eine unbekannte Waffe zerstört wurden. Und da die Schiffssplitter so zerstreut sind, war es eher ein kurzer Kampf. Sie wurden von jemandem überfallen und alle im Bruchteil eines Augenblicks zerstört. Jemandem, dem wir noch nie zuvor begegnet sind."
languages.original_text: "These are the ship carcasses. Judging by their insignia, they belonged to Lord Inquisitor's fleet and, I dare to assume, patrolled this place. The damage sustained indicates that ships were destroyed by an unknown weapon, and the scattering of their shards presumes a brief battle. Someone raided them and destroyed every single one of them in the blink of an eye. Someone we have never encountered before."

traits.locale_text: "Es handelt sich um Schiffskadaver. Ihren Insignien nach zu urteilen gehörten sie zur Flotte des Großinquisitors und waren hier auf Patrouille, wie ich annehme. Die Schäden lassen darauf schließen, dass die Schiffe durch eine unbekannte Waffe zerstört wurden. Und da die Schiffssplitter so zerstreut sind, war es eher ein kurzer Kampf. Sie wurden von jemandem überfallen und alle im Bruchteil eines Augenblicks zerstört. Jemandem, dem wir noch nie zuvor begegnet sind."

languages.text: «Son restos de naves. A juzgar por sus insignias, eran de la flota del Lord Inquisidor y probablemente se dedicaran a patrullar esta zona. Desconocemos el arma que ha provocado los daños que presentan, y la forma en la que se han dispersado sus fragmentos indica que la batalla no ha durado mucho. Es posible que alguien los asaltase y destruyera en un abrir y cerrar de ojos... Alguien a quien no nos hemos enfrentado nunca».
languages.original_text: "Those are ship carcasses. Judging by their markings, they were part of the Lord Inquisitor's fleet and likely acted as a patrol force. The damage doesn't look like it came from any weapon we know, and the way the debris are scattered suggests that the battle was short. Someone attacked and destroyed every one of them in the blink of an eye. Someone we have never encountered before."

traits.locale_text: «Son restos de naves. A juzgar por sus insignias, eran de la flota del Lord Inquisidor y probablemente se dedicaran a patrullar esta zona. Desconocemos el arma que ha provocado los daños que presentan, y la forma en la que se han dispersado sus fragmentos indica que la batalla no ha durado mucho. Es posible que alguien los asaltase y destruyera en un abrir y cerrar de ojos... Alguien a quien no nos hemos enfrentado nunca».

languages.text: 「あれは船の死骸です。位置から判断すると、ロード・インクィジターの艦隊の一部で、パトロール部隊のようです。私たちが知っている武器に与えられたダメージではないようですね。破片が散らばっているところを見ると、戦闘は短時間で終わったようです。誰かが攻撃し、瞬く間に破壊したに違いないです。我々が遭遇したことのないような敵です」
languages.original_text: "Those are ship carcasses. Judging by their markings, they were part of the Lord Inquisitor's fleet and likely acted as a patrol force. The damage doesn't look like it came from any weapon we know, and the way the debris are scattered suggests that the battle was short. Someone attacked and destroyed every one of them in the blink of an eye. Someone we have never encountered before."

traits.locale_text: 「あれは船の死骸です。位置から判断すると、ロード・インクィジターの艦隊の一部で、パトロール部隊のようです。私たちが知っている武器に与えられたダメージではないようですね。破片が散らばっているところを見ると、戦闘は短時間で終わったようです。誰かが攻撃し、瞬く間に破壊したに違いないです。我々が遭遇したことのないような敵です」
